# modelarium

Python wrapper for the **Modelarium** Java agent-based modelling framework.

> ⚠️ This package is currently a placeholder to reserve the PyPI name.
> The full Python API will be introduced in a future release.

## Project status
- Java core: available via Maven Central (`dev.modelarium:modelarium`)
- Python wrapper: **in development**

## Links
- Java library: https://github.com/JoshMcDonagh/Modelarium
- Author: Joshua McDonagh
